usage.title: Usage
usage.coerce: Don't forget to use z.coerce on types other than String!
usage.infer: Now your env infers types from Zod schema.
usage.fallback: You can also use z.default() to provide a fallback.

config.title: Configuration
config.text: By default, parse falls back to process.env, if no .env file was found.
config.env: You can ignore process.env fallback by adding:
config.path: Or you can specify it's path using path parameter:
